channel.title: Help me with server problems
channel.description: alright well i got my server the way i want it and everythings good except....i can log on but no one else can, i have the server running and no-ip up with my server ip checked, moparscape is up and i have port fowarding (i think), please help what do i need to do? i think i have port fowarding up i went to my ip adress in the adress bar and loged in and made a port fowarding...in the tutorial it said to name it after ur server which mine is battlefield...so i put battlefield as service name and then 43594 as port and i put my ip adress to my computer. but it still doesnt work...it shows port fowarding and allows me to click ok but no one can log on my server...i had a feeling i needed to put my noip ip in it but i tryed and didnt work...do i need to put moparscape instead of my server name? what do i need to do? or is my port fowarding fine and is it something else? what i really need is a step by step maybe with pics tutorial on how to get ur server to where people can join... please help me out here im in desperate needs...i know how to java code and all that stuff so i dont need help with my server script just help with letting people join my server...thanks

ok ill try thank you for not flaming me and helping me out here…[br][size=1]Posted on: May 20, 2007, 06:51:37 AM[/size][hr]it didnt work it still wont let anyone on

item.title: Help me with server problems
item.dc:creator: @nov9862 nov9862
item.description:
@nov9862 wrote:

Hmm… Open Up Your windows Firewall and Find Exceptions Tab

Add Port 43594

item.title: Help me with server problems
item.dc:creator: @puppy_boy puppy boy
item.description:
@puppy_boy wrote:

are you connecting to your server using a local thingy like “127.0.0.1” or “localhost”?
if so try again with the no-ip and see if you can connect

Read full topic

item.title: Help me with server problems
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

Is 192.168.1.3 your lan address? If not you’ll need to make it forward to your address. Otherwise everything looks fine.

P.S. You will NOT be able to log in using your IP or your No-IP. Thats for others. You use localhost or 0.0.0.0.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me with server problems
item.dc:creator: @old_nite old_nite
item.description:
@old_nite wrote:

ill just type what it says
it says~ as follows exactly~

Service Name- Battlfield
Service Type- TCP/UDP
Starting Port- 43594 -(1~65534)
Ending Port- 43594 -(1~65534)
Server IP Address- 192.168.1.3

thats exaclty what it says and i have a NETGEAR WGR614 V6 router…its connected to my main computer and im on my own computer

please help me and thank you

Read full topic

item.title: Help me with server problems
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

log into ur router
show the screen with the forwarding info
hit prt sc(print screen)
go into paint and paste it
crop it down a bit and go to www.tinypic.com
upload it
copy second link
post here

Read full topic
